nodes.title: Second Brain Manifesto
nodes.excerpt: Did you know our brain is loaded daily with 34 GB of information? That's on average 11.8 hours of information per day. Almost 4 hours more…

nodes.title: How to have and prioritise ideas?
nodes.excerpt: When you're a maker, you probably have at least one of these problems: You have  no ideas . You have  too many ideas . But not enough time…
